org.jasig.cas.support.events

Class AbstractCasEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
        • org.jasig.cas.support.events.AbstractCasEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CasProxyGrantingTicketCreatedEvent, CasProxyTicketGrantedEvent, CasRegisteredServiceDeletedEvent, CasRegisteredServiceSavedEvent, CasServiceTicketGrantedEvent, CasServiceTicketValidatedEvent, CasTicketGrantingTicketCreatedEvent, CasTicketGrantingTicketDestroyedEvent

    public abstract class AbstractCasEvent
extends org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base Spring ApplicationEvent representing a abstract single sign on action executed within running CAS server. This event encapsulates Authentication that is associated with an SSO action executed in a CAS server and an SSO session token in the form of ticket granting ticket id. More concrete events are expected to subclass this abstract type.
    Since:
    4.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
